name: Gwen, le livre de sable
summary: Gwen is a young girl adopted by a nomad tribe in a desert post-apocalyptic world. When Gwen's friend is kidnapped, she and an old woman called Roseline embark on a trip to bring him back.
info:
• 中文名: 沙漠之书
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: Gwen, or the Book of Sand
  • 上映年度: 1985-02-06
  • 片长: 67 分钟
  • 导演: Jean-François Laguionie
